Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at O'Hare.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problems 54th/Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problems 54th/Cermak. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
